Ntawv Tsis Tiam


Production Year:

2014

Producer(s):

Keeb Kwm Video Production

Writer(s):

Kwm Lis

Publisher:

Keeb Kwm Video Production

Release Type:

DVD

Storage Location:

Center for Hmong Studies

Zaj yeeb yaj kiab (Ntawv Tsis Tiam) yog (Nkauj See) txoj kev hlub, uas nws plam tsis tau tus nws hlub, npaum li plam tag nrho ib sim ntawm nws lub neej tsis muaj tus txij nkawm, Nkauj See thiaj txiav tsim siab los nyob mob ncus rau txoj kev hlub uas tsis tau (Pheej).
